sections.heading: Nature of lien.Section 576.2 - Enforcement of lien.
sections.text:
576.1 Nature of lien.

Every forwarding and commission merchant shall have a lien upon all property of every kind in the merchant’s possession, for the transportation and storage thereof, for all lawfulcharges and services thereon or in connection therewith, and, if sold under the provisions ofthis chapter, for selling the same. [R60, §1898, 1899, 1900 – 1902; C73, §2177 – 2179; C97, §3130, 3131; S13, §3131; C24, 27, 31, 35, 39, §

10341;

C46, 50, 54, 58, 62, 66, 71, 73, 75, 77, 79, 81, §576.1] Bond to release, chapter 584 Sat Dec 23 11:08:19 2023 Iowa Code 2024, Section 576.1 (15, 0)

sections.heading: Enforcement of lien.
sections.text:
576.2 Enforcement of lien.

Said lien may be foreclosed in the manner provided in the uniform commercial code, section 554.7308. [R60, §1898 – 1905; C73, §2177 – 2182; C97, §3130 – 3134; S13, §3131; C24, 27, 31, 35, 39, §

10342;

C46, 50, 54, 58, 62, 66, 71, 73, 75, 77, 79, 81, §576.2] Attachment to enforce lien, §640.1 Sat Dec 23 11:08:19 2023 Iowa Code 2024, Section 576.2 (15, 0)
